name: Meowkour! - A Scorejam #19 Submission!
description:
!!If youre stuck on the name screen, just spam the Enter and Arrow keys until youre out!!

Become Marci, your average cat.

Yea, I mean have you not seen cat jump around like mad and unleash wonton destruction in a person's home?

Anyways controls are
A/D or Arrow Keys for movement
Space for Jump
Enter for clicking buttons (or just your mouse)

Meowkour! is also compatible with xbox controllers

CREDITS
Programming and LootLocker Integration - Caduckic
Game Design, Visual Design, Sound Design - Vuanotto

Most sounds are sourced from the BBC Sound Library
Music
Menu theme - Vuanotto
Level Theme - @RedEye_Factory & Vuanotto
